definition: to understand/to realize/to find out
to understand/to realize/to find out
(completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
unofficial variant of 瞭[liao4]
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly
(of eyes) bright/clear-sighted/to understand clearly
acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to transport under guard
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection
surname Xie

sentences.english: However, Toni, who knows Ribery well, believes the Bianconeri should sign him.
sentences.chinese: 然而托尼很了解里贝里，并且相信尤文会签下他。

sentences.english: I know him quite well, and there are wheels within wheels.
sentences.chinese: 我很了解他，那里的人事关系很复杂。

sentences.english: But first, we need to know some terminology.
sentences.chinese: 不过，我们首先需要了解一些术语。

sentences.english: You want to know more about Ili?
sentences.chinese: 你想更多地了解伊犁啊？

sentences.english: Learn how Montessori teaches mathematics in this free video clip.
sentences.chinese: 了解如何在这个自由蒙台梭利教数学的视频剪辑。

sentences.english: Acute toxicity test, mutation test and single-cell gel electrophoresis(SCGE)were used.
sentences.chinese: 了解三氯乙醛的毒性和致突变作用。

sentences.english: Some evidence is available to aid our understanding of the biogenesis of membrane of microbodies in plants.
sentences.chinese: 有些证据有助于我们了解植物微体膜的生物发生。

sentences.english: We've learned more general things about parametric equations of curves.
sentences.chinese: 我们还了解了，曲线参数方程更一般的性质。

sentences.english: You should learn some ABCs of computer.
sentences.chinese: 你了解编程的基础知识吗？

sentences.english: Listen to the tape and find out the main idea of this article and how it is organized.
sentences.chinese: 通过听录音磁带，来帮助学生对文章的结构有所了解。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo find out the cause and actualities of pre-hospital care of pedo-burn.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解小儿烧伤的致伤因素和院前急救现状。

sentences.english: You can find more information from the Service Directory in your room .
sentences.chinese: 您可以从您房间的服务指南中了解更多的资料。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the in-doors air condition and the factors affecting the air quality of Guangzhou metro.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解影响广州地铁室内空气质量的主要因素。

sentences.english: See publication AV-4, Actuated Thermoplastic Valves, for detailed information.
sentences.chinese: 参阅“执行机构驱动热塑性阀门”，了解详细资料。

sentences.english: Its authors had detailed knowledge of Siemens’ software and its security weaknesses.
sentences.chinese: 笔者已经详细的了解了西门子软件的安全漏洞在哪里。

sentences.english: Objective To understand the needs of the families of hearing-impaired children.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解听障儿童家长对康复认知与需求情况。

to comprehend/to understand/comprehension/understanding
to tell/to inform/to let know
to press charges/to file a complaint
to know/to recognize/to be familiar with/to get acquainted with sb/knowledge/understanding/awareness/cognition
clear/distinct/to understand thoroughly/to be clear about
to clarify/to fully understand
to penetrate deeply/thorough
to consult/to refer to/to look sth up in a reference source
to grasp (often fig.)/to control/to seize (initiative, opportunity, destiny)/to master/to know well/to understand sth well and know how to use it/fluency
detailed/in detail/minute
to find out/to know/to learn about
to check/to inquire/to consult (a document etc)/inquiry/query
to touch/to contact/access/in touch with
to investigate/to delve/to probe/to enquire into/to look into

connection/contact/relation/to get in touch with/to integrate/to link/to touch
to analyze/analysis/CL:個|个[ge4]
